GapFillDragDrop.Title: Modals
GapFillDragDrop.Instruction: Drag the correct verb to each gap.

Content.Question:
1. I’ve never had to train as regularly for a marathon before. Maybe it’s because I was ill earlier this year and am not as fit as before.
2. I’m sorry that you had problems with your flatmates, but you should have listened to Mum’s advice.
3. You ’ve got to be 17 in the UK to drive a car.
4. It’s an extremely funny play, and the actors are superb. You must go and see it.
5. That can’t be Patrick in that car, the driver is much older and is wearing glasses.
6. I suppose Jill must have gone home already, she’s not in the staff room.
7. It’s 11 p.m. in Australia now. That means Jodie ’ll have seen the concert in the Sydney Opera House.
8. It’s 11 a.m. You ought to be preparing your lessons for class this afternoon.
9. You really shouldn’t have bought me flowers, I was more than happy to help out with the party.
10. Sam’s hair really needs cutting, but he absolutely hates going to the barber’s.
